name: mowear
description: "npm run build": compiling typescript files     "npm run prettier": running prettier     "npm run lint": running eslint     "npm run jasmine": running jasmine tests on built files     "npm run test": building files and running jasmine tests     "npm run start": start server using nodemon     "npm run start_": build server and run index.js # Endpoints     "http://localhost:3000/": Main route     "http://localhost:3000/images/?width=image_width&height=image_height&name=image_name": Endpoint for resizing images

scripts.test: npm run build && set ENV=test && db-migrate --env test down && db-migrate --env test reset && db-migrate --env test up && jasmine
